data.title: Asya Candidate Information Sheet
data.meta_description: ASYA CANDIDATE INFORMATION SHEET - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a candidate information sheet for Samuel Fajardo Argote, who is applying for the position of Researcher with an expected salary of 20,000. It includes his personal details, educational background, employment history, skills, and references. He graduated from Manila Adventis College with a BSBA in Marketing Management and has leadership and lending investment training. His references include a guardian, friend, and schoolmate who can attest to his character. He affirms that all information provided is true and correct.
